Actually I have given you as much call-stack as would be meaningful for you=
.
But I have now uploaded my unittest to http://webteam.archive.org/jira/br=
owse/HER-1097
together with the class taking care of the writing.

We use t=
his ARCUtils class for copying all Heritrix logs to ARC, before deleting th=
em from the harvesting machine.

Regards
S=F8ren

-

@...>
Sent: Tue 5/8/2007 8:48 PM
